title: Land for Sale in Kandy - Yaggahapitiya
details:
Highly residential land plot in Yaggahapitiya - Kandy.
Next to Kandy House Hotel
( Next to Meegasthanna Ratwatta Maha Walawuwe )
5 km to Maligawa
50 meters to Amunugama Road.
400 meters to Yaggahapitiya Juntion.
20 fetes private road for access.Flat land.
300,000 per perch.
(13.6 x 2 blocks or 27.2 one block )
Three phase electricity
Schools, Food cities,
Pre approved bank loan
20f wide road
pipe born wate
